items.question: How do I connect my email account to Ori-OS?
items.answer: Go to Settings → Mailboxes, choose your provider (Google Workspace or Microsoft 365), and follow the sign-in flow. Once connected, you can assign mailboxes to workspaces and sequences.

items.question: How do I launch my first campaign?
items.answer: Create or import a list in your workspace, open Campaigns, choose a sequence template or build your own, assign a mailbox, set daily send limits, and schedule the campaign. We recommend starting with a small batch to test deliverability and messaging.

items.question: What happens when someone unsubscribes or replies 'stop'?
items.answer: Ori-OS adds the contact to your global suppression list for that workspace and stops them from receiving future campaign emails. You can review and manage suppressed contacts in the Compliance section of your workspace.

items.question: Can I export my data from Ori-OS?
items.answer: Yes. Workspace admins can export contacts, campaigns, and pipeline data from the Settings or Data sections. Exports are provided in CSV format so you can move data to other tools or for reporting.

items.question: How do I change or cancel my subscription?
items.answer: Go to Billing in your Ori-OS account to change plans, update payment details, or manage renewal settings. If you need help structuring a plan for multiple workspaces, contact our support team.
